name: WhoisRajiv
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: who is rajiv
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to know more about Rajiv? Just ask and I'll tell you a little bit about him.

[How to use]
[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Who is Rajiv” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open Who is Rajiv"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Who is Rajiv."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Who is Rajiv board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
